from the fine tradition that we have in the information technology World which is always do it twice do it once and

completely outside of your visibility and you just see their faces go pale right it's like God only knows what they
have out there and if they've even put a password on it my company information is going to be gone before I can get back to my office and fire them and so what
we decided was that we actually needed a very structured process right begin with the end in mind and so what Amazon web

with education and engagement which makes sure that everybody's on the same page and everybody understands what cloud is and isn't the shared security
model AWS does some Partners does some customer is not off the hook right there's the security of the cloud and
Security in the cloud and then organizing a business's processes so
